original: Nama’tthu jana santāna, tama santāna bhedino;
analyzed: namatthu jana santāna tama santāna bhedino

original: Suddhamāgadhikānaṃ taṃ, na sādheti yathicchitaṃ ya’dicchitaṃ yati’cchitaṃ (ka.).

tatas māgadha bhāsāya matta āvaṇṇa vibhedanam

idam vutta udayam nāma lokiya chanda nissitam
ārabhissam aham dāni tesam sukha vibuddhiyā

original: Majjha’ntalā ra,te’te’ṭṭha, gaṇā go garu,lo lahu.

original: Saṃyogā’di ca, dīgho ca, niggahītaparo ca, yo;

original: Garu, vaṅko, pādanto,vā, rasso’ñño mattiko lu’ju.

original: Lahu sa kvaci viññeyyo, tadudāharaṇaṃ yathā.

original: Ta’daḍḍhasama, maññaṃ tu, bhinna lakkhaṇa pādikaṃ.

original: Daṇḍakā caṇḍavuṭṭhyā’di, pādehi chahi, tīhi tu;

original: 19. Ariyāsāmaññaṃ ce, pubbo’dita lakkhaṇaṃ bhave yassā.

original: 20. Ādima’matha pādayugaṃ, yassā tyaṃ’sehi sā pathyā.

original: 58. Ñeyyā mattā ma, bha, sa, gayuttā.
